chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Paitr Conel, p. 53 (61)—A young boy from Andor who comes to meet Morgase in Amador. He was one of the many Darkfriends who found Rand and Mat on their way to Caemlyn due to the evil of Mat's dagger from Shadar Logoth. He was apparently one of the few people the Whitecloaks were correct about.… See also Jen.
